title: IAP - Confirm Purchase Copy
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user is a LITE user 
and taps on the MiLB.TV button
and sees the paywall
and user taps on monthly purchase

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the confirm purchase copy reads as: 
Do you want to modify your subscription to MiLB.tv for 1-month at $12.99? Your new subscription will begin and you'll be charged when your current subscription expires on MM,DD,YYYY

*Note: date in text references renewal happening in year instead of referencing renewal happening in month, this is controlled by Apple

title: In-App Purchase*
custom_preconds:
iOS:
Given the user has a DEBUG build installed
And the user has navigated to a paywall

Android:
Doesn't require a special build

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps the MiLB.TV Monthly option
And enters a valid iTunes Sandbox account
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the transaction is successful
And the user can dismiss the "Connect Purchase" screen
And the user will have MiLB.TV access 
And the user will not see Lite ads

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user accesses the MiLB.tv paywall
And purchases MLB.tv Yearly successfully
And then links to a BAMNET account on the "Connect Purchase" screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will have access to MiLB.tv
And the user will not see Lite ads
And the BAMNET account will display the purchases and entitlement in the CS Tool

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user uninstalls the build
And reinstalls the build
And accesses a paywall
And taps the "Restore" button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user's purchases (At Bat Monthly and MLB.tv Monthly) will be restored
And the user can dismiss the "Connect Purchase" screen
And the user will have At Bat and MLB.tv access

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user installs the build on another device
And launches the app
And accesses a paywall
And logs in with their BAMNET account (FROM STEP 2)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will have access to MiLB.tv

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user uninstalls the build
And reinstalls the build
And the user taps the At Bat Monthly option
And enters a valid iTunes Sandbox account
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the transaction is successful
And the user can link to their BAMNET account on the "Connect Purchase" screen
And the user will have At Bat access (Ex. Gameday Audio)
And the user will not see Lite ads

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user user with IAP features upgrades their at bat version
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should not see Paywall but should see the favorite team list appear (with their fav. team retained) followed by the Notification page
